adrFormatAddress: 3878 Broadway, New York, NY 10032-1545, USA

originalText.text: I started going to Halal chicks since they first open a couple of months ago! Stated getting the chicken over rice or the lamb over rice you get to add on your own toppings from the mini cold station.But last week I saw a order going out and it looked sooo good so I asked the employee what was this called !!! It was fried tenders cut up over french fries and it was doused with there house sauce and he said it taste better than it looks so today I had to try it by the way all my coworkers I presbyterian love this place some even get the burgers , some get the loaded fries so I had to try this today and boy I was not disappointed. I asked him to fry the chicken very soft  and they did a perfect job. My husband got a burger which he said was good but this platter right here was so good. Let‚Äôs talk about amazing customer service. I‚Äôll try to put a dollar or two in the tip jar because they do a amazing job. They get a Lot of deliveries and all cultures come in to Halal chicks . PLEASE STAY TRUE TO THE PROJECT CAUSE WE LOVE IT !!!!

originalText.text:
We have been ordering from doordash delivery and our 2nd time today
So far the food are good

We have tried the following

1. Chicken and rice platter 3/5 8yr rating
2. Chicken and lamb rice platter 4/5 hubby approved
3. Chicken wings 5/5 (our fave)
4. Chicken quesadillas 1/5 üò¢ it could be because it‚Äôs not to my liking, but it could be good for others. (This was my order)

2nd order

1. Chicken and fries 3/5
2. Philly cheesesteaks 5/5 (our fave)
3. Double cheeseburger 2/5 (it‚Äôs under seasoned but the smoky flavor is there)
4. Chicken tenders 3/5
5. The fries are seasoned, we love it

We have not been inside the physical restaurant so I can‚Äôt say anything about the atmosphere

The portions are big, the chicken and fries can feed 3 people
We received out food hot and fresh

Some are not here, was too hungry üòÅ

I totally recommend this place

originalText.text:
Firstly to say, the staff there are very friendly.
And there are a lot of choices of sides and my favorites are the cucumber salad and pickled pepper. This combo makes my meal more fresh and taste.
I really recommend this store.
* the container looks very small but the food inside is very heavy actually.
